      • isLoaded

        boolean isLoaded(java.lang.String id)
        Checks if a plugin is loaded based on its ID. This may contain plugins/mods from other systems in some implementations.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the Plugin
        Returns:
        true if loaded false if not loaded.
